english.segment1: Im packing for my last train. Im off to see the countryside. Im kissing my last lips. Will I make it till the morning time?
english.segment2: Tossing and turning in sleep. I cant feel my heart beat. Oh maker of earth and the seas. Pray relief.
english.segment3: I remember when we first kissed. Stayed up until the morning rise. Just cant go any further. I feel like Im going to die.
english.segment4: Tossing and turning in sleep. I cant feel my heart beat. Oh maker of earth and the seas. Pray relief.
english.segment5: When Im looking in the mirror, all I see is the frightening eyes. Can I make it any further? Can I make it to the morning rise?
english.segment6: Tossing and turning in sleep. I cant feel my heart beat. Oh maker of earth and the seas. Pray relief.
